title: City of God: The Fight Rages On
overview: City of God: The Fight Rages On takes place two decades after the events of the highly acclaimed film "City of God." City of God: The Fight Rages On is an adapted continuation of the literary work by Paulo Lins, and will follow the story of its characters, starting with the work of the photographer Buscap√©. Set in the early 2000s, the series includes excerpts from the film as flashbacks to reconstruct the protagonists' memories.
